root.name: Bob the Builder: Fix it Fun!
root.description: OverviewBob the Builder: Fix it Fun! is a game developed by Tiertex Design Studios and published by THQ in the United States and BBC Multimedia in the UK for the Game Boy Color platform.GameplayBob the Builder is a side-scrolling platforming game. The game is broken into different missions or chores to complete.ControlsA Button - Pressing the A button will make Bob jump.B Button - Holding down the B button while walking in either direction will make Bob run.D-Pad - Pressing the D-Pad in the right or left directions will make Bob walk left or right.Start - The Start button will pause the game and select the mission.Select - The Select button functions the same as the Start button.
